channel.title: Education on mrfrase3
channel.description: Recent content in Education on mrfrase3

item.title: [old] A-Blocks
item.description: A block-based coding interface that allows children to program 3D and VR applications.

item.title: [superseded] Chromeduino
item.description: A Chrome App which uses the serial API on the chrome browser to program AVR Arduinos with a serial bootloader that is avrdude compatible (Arduino Uno, Mega, etc)

item.title: [old] RemoteDojo 3.0
item.description: A chatting application that allows children in remote regions to access CoderDojo Mentors.
